channel.title: Critical Role & Sagas of Sundry
channel.description: Welcome to Geek & Sundry’s hub for all things RPG! Each week, our collection of deeply nerdy storytellers take you on epic journeys across the multiverse in our critically acclaimed actual play podcasts that use tabletop role-playing games to tell ever-evolving, improvised stories, including the complete collection of Critical Role’s Campaign 1. Current Season: Ten Candles: Eclipse 40 players, one game master, zero survivors. Welcome to Ten Candles: Eclipse, a captivating series based on a game of tragic horror. Join storyteller Ivan Van Norman and a rotating cast of doomed souls as they rage, rage against the dyling of the light. And then get prepared to meet some of the coolest people from around the gaming world in Quests N’ Answers, our deep dive interview series! Craving even more adventures? Past seasons include: Critical Role Campaign 1 | Vox Machina (C1E1-C115): A band of eight unlikely heroes, find themselves on a quest to save the realm of Exandria from dark magical forces in this epic saga starring Matthew Mercer, Travis Willingham, Laura Bailey, Liam O’Brien, Ashley Johnson, Marisha Ray, and Sam Riegel. The show that inspired Prime Video’s The Legend of Vox Machina animated series. Critical Role Campaign 2 | Mighty Nein (C2E1-C2E19): Set 20 years after the events of Campaign One, a group of seven adventurers coalesce on the continent of Wildemount where they discover ancient evils, sinister plots, and far more than they bargained for. Experience the rest of the story on CriticalRole.com. Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode: Three monstrous minions find themselves in charge for once when the evil necromancer they serve mysteriously disappears. Will they remain in the dungeon or venture into the light to tell their own tale? Find out on Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode with gamemaster Amy Vorpahl and cast members Jason Nguyen, Danielle Radford, and Dan Casey. Relics & Rarities: Created by Deborah Ann Woll (Daredevil, True Blood), this bold episodic fantasy story transports you to a world of magic, murder, and monsters. In a story guided by Woll, using Dungeons & Dragons as a core narrative mechanic, a crew of bold players embark on a quest to stop an unholy prophecy from coming to fruition. Special guests include Matthew Lillard, Kevin Smith, Charlie Cox, and more. Plus, we have a plethora of one-shot adventures under our CelebriD&D banner, with guest stars like Vin Diesel, Joe Manganiello, and many more! Video versions and more information available on https://www.geekandsundry.com

channel.content:encoded:
Welcome to Geek & Sundry’s hub for all things RPG! Each week, our collection of deeply nerdy storytellers take you on epic journeys across the multiverse in our critically acclaimed actual play podcasts that use tabletop role-playing games to tell ever-evolving, improvised stories, including the complete collection of Critical Role’s Campaign 1.

Current Season: Ten Candles: Eclipse

40 players, one game master, zero survivors. Welcome to Ten Candles: Eclipse, a captivating series based on a game of tragic horror. Join storyteller Ivan Van Norman and a rotating cast of doomed souls as they rage, rage against the dyling of the light.

And then get prepared to meet some of the coolest people from around the gaming world in Quests N’ Answers, our deep dive interview series!

Craving even more adventures? Past seasons include:

Critical Role Campaign 1 | Vox Machina (C1E1-C115): A band of eight unlikely heroes, find themselves on a quest to save the realm of Exandria from dark magical forces in this epic saga starring Matthew Mercer, Travis Willingham, Laura Bailey, Liam O’Brien, Ashley Johnson, Marisha Ray, and Sam Riegel. The show that inspired Prime Video’s The Legend of Vox Machina animated series.

Critical Role Campaign 2 | Mighty Nein (C2E1-C2E19): Set 20 years after the events of Campaign One, a group of seven adventurers coalesce on the continent of Wildemount where they discover ancient evils, sinister plots, and far more than they bargained for. Experience the rest of the story on CriticalRole.com.

Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode: Three monstrous minions find themselves in charge for once when the evil necromancer they serve mysteriously disappears. Will they remain in the dungeon or venture into the light to tell their own tale? Find out on Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode with gamemaster Amy Vorpahl and cast members Jason Nguyen, Danielle Radford, and Dan Casey.

Relics & Rarities: Created by Deborah Ann Woll (Daredevil, True Blood), this bold episodic fantasy story transports you to a world of magic, murder, and monsters. In a story guided by Woll, using Dungeons & Dragons as a core narrative mechanic, a crew of bold players embark on a quest to stop an unholy prophecy from coming to fruition. Special guests include Matthew Lillard, Kevin Smith, Charlie Cox, and more.

Plus, we have a plethora of one-shot adventures under our CelebriD&D banner, with guest stars like Vin Diesel, Joe Manganiello, and many more!

Video versions and more information available on https://www.geekandsundry.com

item.title: Chapter Six: Let the Bodies Hit the Floor | Sagas of Sundry: Dread
item.description:
A book has been retrieved. But what's in the book? WHAT'S IN THE BOOK?!! Join our group of campers and find out now.
Sagas of Sundry: Dread is an original macabre tale hosted by Ivan Van Norman where cast members Matthew Mercer, Satine Phoenix, Amy Vorpahl, Taliesin Jaffe, and Amy Dallen play a giant puzzle game to build the tension. You don't want to know what happens if the tower collapses!
Featuring Darin De Paul as Mr. Wren. Video versions are available at https://www.youtube.com/geekandsundry
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Chapter Five: Over and Over and Over | Sagas of Sundry: Dread

item.title: Chapter One: It's Just a Camping Trip | Sagas of Sundry: Dread
item.description:
A group of five friends get together for a summer camping trip. On Sat's insistence, they're going to the same place they went on last year's trip. What could possibly go wrong?
Sagas of Sundry: Dread is an original macabre tale hosted by Ivan Van Norman where cast members Matthew Mercer, Satine Phoenix, Amy Vorpahl, Taliesin Jaffe, and Amy Dallen play a giant puzzle game to build the tension. You don't want to know what happens if the tower collapses!
Featuring Darin De Paul as Mr. Wren. Video versions are available at https://www.youtube.com/geekandsundry Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Featuring Darin De Paul as Mr. Wren. Video versions are available at https://www.youtube.com/geekandsundry

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: The Secret History of Board Games (w/ Tim Clare)
item.description:
How is Abraham Lincoln’s beard responsible for modern board gaming? Did Swedish prisons really make inmates roll death saves? What is it about board games that sink their hooks into us? This week on Quests N' Answers, Dan Casey sits down with author Tim Clare to answer all of these questions and more, which are explored at length in his new book Across the Board: How Board Games Make Us Human
Learn more about Across the Board: How Board Games Make Us Human: http://bit.ly/403G7Nh

item.title: How Do Games Like DAGGERHEART Get Made? (w/ Ivan Van Norman)
item.description:
A bold new era of heroic fantasy tabletop role-playing has begun with Daggerheart! This week on Quests N' Answers, Dan Casey sits down with the amazing Ivan Van Norman of Darrington Press and Hunters Entertainment to talk about how games like Daggerheart actually get made, his journey into the world of game publishing, and much more.
Learn more about Daggerheart: https://www.daggerheart.com/
Learn more about Sin Eater on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/huntersbooks/sin-eater-0?ref=3cptpe

item.title: Lost Odyssey: Godfall | Full Presentation
item.description:
Welcome back to the table. Lost Odyssey: Godfall, a one-of-a-kind actual play game special showcasing a new Pathfinder story. Tabletop legends reunite in a new experience for Extra Life. Starring Matt Mercer as Ghentros, Reggie Watts as Bronwyn, Deborah Ann Woll as Audrey, Felicia Day as Sylph, and Brandon Routh as Palanon, as alongside Game Master Bill Rehor, they embark on a tabletop roleplaying experience like no other in a new Lost Odyssey one-shot to raise support for Extra Life for Kids.
Explore Lost Odyssey’s Extra Life Superteam page at https://www.lostodysseyevents.com, where you'll find treasures in a collection of games, show exclusive props, tabletop gear, and more. 100% of all proceeds benefit Extra Life for Kids, a program of Children's Miracle Network Hospitals.
#LostOdysseyGodfall #UniteForExtraLife

item.title: Reimagining Blood on the Clocktower w/ Becca Scott | Quests N’ Answers
item.description:
Welcome back to Quests N’ Answers! This week, Dan Casey sits down with the one and only Becca Scott (Good Time Society, Dimension 20, Parlor Room) to break down her approach to running RPGs, transforming Blood on the Clocktower into a narrative actual play series, her brand new Dropout series Parlor Room, and much more.

item.title: No Gods No Masters | Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode | Episode 20
item.description: Deep inside an active volcano on the verge of eruption, the Terror Squad must face their greatest nemesis yet: the so-called “heroes” that destroyed their home way back in episode 1! It’s a battle for the fate of the world as they know it in the season finale of Goblin Mode. Who will win? Who will die? Will Tippy’s artificer abilities drive Amy insane? item.title: Introducing Rude Tales of Magic’s Brand New Campaign
item.description:
This episode was originally titled [New Campaign Premiere] All God's Creatures.
WELCOME TO NETHERMURK
So many strange things lie below, cut off from the surface, at home in the deepest, darkest caves. Who would dare tell their story? Surely not the brave and good-looking cast of Rude Tales of Magic. Unless-no! They wouldn't! Would they??? Goddamn. They just might be crazy enough to do it.

item.title: Introducing Rotating Heroes
item.description:
This episode was originally titled Arc 8 Ep. 1: Trails Of A New World PART 1.
With a new DM, 2 new players, and a returning hero there is much to unpack in Arc 8. After being taken on a spiritual journey, Freaya Black must start to unravel the mysteries of her past to determine the course of her future, but fear not she will have the help of some new friends whom she feels an instant connection to!
WELCOME TO ARC 8! We hope you enjoy the latest installment in the World Of Amalar!
Jasper William Cartwright is your DM Zac Oyama is playing ??? Erika Ishii is Soapfeathers & And Last but least forgettable is Victoria Longwell aka Freaya Black Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: The Goblin Games | Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode | Episode 15
item.description: Welcome to the 59th Annual Goblin Hero Games! This year, we have a very special competitor, one who has cheated death, turned a kegger into a rager, and built a sentient cannon with googly eyes. It’s Tippy Terror Squad, who definitely isn’t a baby! Will Tippy conquer The Goblin Games and be crowned a Goblin Hero? Will Bizzee and Fibs get caught sabotaging the competition? Just what the heck are these NPC names anyway? Find out for yourself on a thrilling new episode of Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.description: The Terror Squad are absolutely swamped after escaping a fate worse than death on the Ethereal Plane. No, seriously, they’re in a gigantic swamp. But not just any swamp; this one has a surprising connection to Tippy’s past…and the Terror Squad’s future as pro athletes. Wait, what? item.description: Deep in the heart of the Ethereal Realm, Bizzee and Fibs desperately try to save Tippy’s life, but first they must defeat their greatest enemy: themselves. Or more specifically, the people they once were: Barigneas and Filverel, played by special guest Ross Bryant (MST3K, Improvised Shakespeare Company, Dropout). Who will live? Who will die? Who will be reduced to a pile of etheric goo? Find out on a thrilling new episode of Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Life After Death (w/ Ross Bryant) | Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode | Episode 12
item.description:
After the death of a dear friend, The Terror Squad must journey to the Ethereal Realm to try and save him. But what they find there is more than they bargained for…and may bring some uncomfortable memories back to the surface. Special guest Ross Bryant (MST3K, Improvised Shakespeare Company, Dropout) joins the table for an unforgettable new episode of Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode!

item.title: Goblin Mode Midseason Recap (Episodes 1-11) | Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode
item.description:
The Terror Squad are midway through their epic adventure, so let’s recap everything that has transpired over the first 11 episodes of Geek & Sundry’s latest actual play fantasy saga! Relive all the ecstatic highs and devastating lows of this underdog story about three minions – a goblin and two skeletons -- exploring life outside the dungeon they once called home in.
Whether you want to brush up on everything you missed or you want to start with the latest episode, we’ve got you covered with this deep dive into Bizzee, Tippy, and Fibs’ ongoing adventures.
Go to NordVPN.com/crss to get 4 extra months on a 2-year plan!
Goblin Mode is also as a video podcast on Geek & Sundry’s YouTube: https://lnk.to/goblinmodepod
Learn more and sign up for the Geek & Sundry newsletter at https://www.geekandsundry.com/!

item.title: Introducing: Backwater Bastards
item.description: Greetings Adventurers! This week, we're bringing you an episode of one more show we think you'll enjoy: Backwater Bastards! Backwater Bastards is a sci-fi comedy actual play podcast played by three international artists with an emphasis on slice-of-life style situational humor. This show features immersive sound design, its very own game system, Orbital Refuse- and a team of alien antiheroes that will choose each other over the universe every time. Join Cleo the human-bear, Dr. Ze the psionic jellyfish, and a sentient ship called Reese as they take on the galaxy with their motley crew of space-trash and found family. After a few years of evading societal responsibility and trying to survive the wilds of space despite themselves, they’ve got a couple of worlds worth of connections and some real weird enemies in the rearview. Season 2 Episode 01: The Butter Knife Cleo and Ze race to get out of Zarg Moon territory before the New Terran forces blockade the entire sector. Aboard their starship the Grey Dragon, powered by an A.I. called Reese and piloted by the Zargian hero Trevor, The Bastards make a dash for it. And oh, Boris is there too! We wouldn't want to forget Boris. Ya never know when he may come in handy. So join us on Backwater Bastards: The GREATEST BEST FRIEND STORY the galaxy has ever seen! Available for free wherever you get your podcasts or at backwaterbastards.com Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

This show features immersive sound design, its very own game system, Orbital Refuse- and a team of alien antiheroes that will choose each other over the universe every time.

Join Cleo the human-bear, Dr. Ze the psionic jellyfish, and a sentient ship called Reese as they take on the galaxy with their motley crew of space-trash and found family. item.title: CelebriD&D with The Suicide Squad's Nathan Fillion, Michael Rooker, & Flula Borg
item.description:
Join the stars of The Suicide Squad as they embark on the Dungeons & Dragons adventure of a lifetime! Nathan Fillion, Michael Rooker, and Flula Borg are a trio of goblins on a mission to kidnap some high-value targets with important information in a hilarious adventure helmed by Dungeon Master Riley Silverman. Who will live? Who will die? Will Riley be able to herd these fantasy-cats and keep them on task? Find out in a brand new episode of CelebriD&D!

item.title: Introducing: D&D Legends and Lore | The Legend of Vecna
item.description: Greetings Adventurers! This week, we're bringing you an episode of another show we think you'll love: D&D Legends and Lore. D&D Legends and Lore brings to life the stories that D&D’s decades of lore has to offer as well as deep diving into said lore and presenting it in a digestible manner perfect for inspiring your own game of Dungeons and Dragons. Whether you are a Dungeon Master, Player, or just someone who enjoys learning about and experiencing great fantasy, D&D Legends and Lore is the podcast you have been waiting for. Wondrous magic, terrifying monsters, gods, demons, and unnamable horrors from beyond time and space, all brought to life and detailed on a podcast that runs on the imagination. Join us as we venture from the deepest pit of the Nine Hells to the enchanted forests of Arvandor telling tales both valiant and villainous! Please enjoy D&D Legends and Lore | The Legend of Vecna: Are you afraid of the dark? Of things that go bump in the night? Of the horrors and monsters that are as prevalent in D&D as they are in many cultures across the world? Join us as we take a look at one of the Vilest monsters to ever "grace" the pages of D&D, Vecna! Listen to D&D Legends and Lore wherever you get your podcasts and find them on PATREON, Youtube, Discord, Instagram, Twitter! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.description: One man’s trash is another man’s gigantic deadly robot! With a member of The Marked in mortal peril, it’s up to Bizzee, Tippy, Fibs, and Captain Raetelg to save the day. Find out if these three former lemmings make it out alive on this episode of Sagas of Sundry: Goblin Mode.

item.description: Now tentatively aligned with the Illithid outcast, Clarota, Vox Machina learns more of the Illithid clan living deep in the mines, and the mysterious being that currently controls them. In order to free the clan, Vox Machina must proceed further into the deep, and reach the center of Clarota’s hive. item.description: After Scanlan Shorthalt brought the abomination of a Naga to its tortured end, Vox Machina vowed to Nostoc Greyspine to put an end to the darkness now bubbling up out of the bowls of the earth.
